name: Instyle Extreme Matte Lip Paint - N 017 | 12-Hour Powerful Matte Finish in 1 Swipe
description:
Instyle Extreme Matte Lip Paint - N 017: The Ultimate Long-Lasting Lip Color

Instyle Extreme Matte Lip Paint - N 017 delivers intense color payoff with a stunning velvety finish that beauty enthusiasts can't stop raving about. This premium lip paint combines the precision of a lip liner, the coverage of a lipstick, and the longevity of a stain—all in one elegant tube. 💄

The shade N 017 offers a captivating deep berry tone that complements a wide range of skin tones, making it the perfect choice for both everyday wear and special occasions. The highly pigmented formula ensures that a single application provides full, opaque coverage that lasts throughout your day.

Key Features of Instyle Extreme Matte Lip Paint - N 017

  • 🕒 Up to 12 hours of wear without fading or transferring
  • 💧 Waterproof and smudge-resistant formula
  • 🌿 Enriched with vitamin E and moisturizing oils to prevent drying
  • 🌱 Cruelty-free and vegan-friendly composition
  • 🖌️ Precision applicator for flawless application

Why Choose Instyle Extreme Matte Lip Paint?

Unlike traditional lipsticks that require frequent touch-ups, the Instyle Extreme Matte Lip Paint - N 017 stays put through meals, drinks, and kisses. The lightweight formula feels comfortable on the lips without the sticky sensation often associated with long-wearing lip products. The precision applicator allows for easy definition of your lip contour, eliminating the need for a separate lip liner.

The Instyle Extreme Matte Lip Paint collection has gained popularity among makeup artists and beauty influencers for its professional-quality results and user-friendly application. Shade N 017 specifically has become a bestseller for its versatility and flattering undertones.

Frequently Asked Question

How do I apply Instyle Extreme Matte Lip Paint for maximum longevity?

For optimal results with your Instyle Extreme Matte Lip Paint - N 017, start with exfoliated, moisturized lips. Allow your lip balm to fully absorb, then blot away any excess. Apply the lip paint starting from the center of your lips and work outward, using the precision applicator to define your lip line. For maximum longevity, apply a thin layer, let it dry for 30 seconds, then apply a second layer if desired. Avoid pressing your lips together until the formula has completely dried (approximately 2 minutes).
